name.description: The name of the Minio Object Storage Service

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Minio node

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each Minio node

storage.description: Storage configuration for Minio's application and config on DC/OS

persistant-volume.description: Persistant volumes configuration Local volumes are created on the machine with the hostname specified and Marathon will attempt to re-launch the task on the same machine. Note that if the machine is lost, your data may also be lost.

host-volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting Minio configuration and data.
